pages.text: $(li)The Bigger Dungeon is the direct bigger version of the Small Dungeon that can be found deeper of the caves of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeleton$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombie$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/husk)Husk$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/spider)Spider$(/l) Spawners in this place.
